mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ARTICLE (TYPE_ITEM, TYPE_ARTICLE, DATE_LOST, DATE_UPLOAD, HOLD, PLACE, TITLE, CONTENTS, IMAGE) VALUES (#{article.TYPE_ITEM}, "test", "test", #{article.DATE_UPLOAD}, "1", #{article.PLACE}, #{article.TITLE}, #{article.CONTENTS}, "test" )
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, TYPE_ITEM, TYPE_ARTICLE, DATE_LOST, DATE_UPLOAD, HOLD, PLACE, TITLE, CONTENTS, IMAGE FROM TB_ARTICLE
SELECT SEQ, TYPE_ITEM, TYPE_ARTICLE, DATE_LOST, DATE_UPLOAD, HOLD, PLACE, TITLE, CONTENTS, IMAGE FROM TB_ARTICLE WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
